trans-unit.source: The Domain class represents an Active Directory domain.
trans-unit.target: 領域類別代表 Active Directory 網域。

trans-unit.source: Gets the domains that are children of this domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個網域的子系的網域。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainCollection"></xref> object that contains the child domains.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainCollection"> </xref>物件，其中包含子網域。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified domain.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的網域建立信任關係本機端。

trans-unit.source: This method creates one side of a trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建立信任關係的一方。

trans-unit.source: The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.
trans-unit.target: 在建立雙方的信任之前，不會建立信任。

trans-unit.source: The `trustPassword` parameter associates a password with the created trust.
trans-unit.target: `trustPassword`建立信任與參數產生關聯的密碼。

trans-unit.source: When the other side of the trust is created, the same password is provided and the two local trusts are then bound to each other.
trans-unit.target: 建立信任的另一端時，提供相同的密碼，而且兩個本機信任會接著繫結到彼此。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically create both sides of a trust relationship in a single method call, use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.CreateTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式建立信任關係的雙方單一方法呼叫中，使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.CreateTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.CreateTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the domain that the trust is created with.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立信任之網域的 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection"></xref> members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this domain.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection"></xref>成員，決定相對於這個網域的信任方向。

trans-unit.source: The password for the trust.
trans-unit.target: 信任的密碼。

trans-unit.source: See remarks below.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱下面的備註。

trans-unit.source: The trust relationship already exists.
trans-unit.target: 信任關係已經存在。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: targetDomainName or trustPassword is empty.
trans-unit.target: targetDomainName或trustPassword是空的。

trans-unit.source: targetDomainName or trustPassword is .
trans-unit.target: targetDomainNameor trustPassword is .

trans-unit.source: direction is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: direction不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Creates both sides of a trust relationship with the specified domain.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的網域建立信任關係的雙方。

trans-unit.source: This method creates both sides of a trust relationship with a single method call.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法建立信任關係的兩端具有單一方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is used to create only one side of a trust.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法用來建立信任的一側邊。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object that represents the domain that the trust is being created with.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref>物件，代表要與其建立信任的網域。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection"></xref> members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this domain.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection"></xref>成員，決定相對於這個網域的信任方向。

trans-unit.source: The trust relationship already exists.
trans-unit.target: 信任關係已經存在。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: targetDomain is .
trans-unit.target: targetDomainis .

trans-unit.source: direction is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: direction不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the local side of a trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 刪除信任關係本機端。

trans-unit.source: When one side of a trust relationship is deleted, the trust longer exists.
trans-unit.target: 刪除信任關係的一方時，較長的信任存在。

trans-unit.source: To delete both sides of a trust relationship with one method call, use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.DeleteTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除單一方法呼叫的信任關係的兩端，使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.DeleteTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.DeleteTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the domain that the trust exists with.
trans-unit.target: 與其存在信任之網域的 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the that is specified by the targetDomainName parameter.
trans-unit.target: 沒有信任關係所指定 targetDomainName 參數。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: targetDomainName is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: targetDomainName為空字串。

trans-unit.source: targetDomainName is .
trans-unit.target: targetDomainNameis .

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Deletes both sides of a trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 刪除信任關係的雙方。

trans-unit.source: To delete only one side of a trust relationship, use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.DeleteLocalSideOfTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除的信任關係的只有一個邊，使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.DeleteLocalSideOfTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.DeleteLocalSideOfTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object that represents the domain that the trust exists with.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref>表示與其存在信任之網域的物件。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 沒有信任關係，使用指定<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: targetDomain is .
trans-unit.target: targetDomainis .

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets the domain controllers in this domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個網域中的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection"></xref> object that contains the domain controllers in this domain.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection"> </xref>物件，其中包含這個網域的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the mode that this domain is operating in.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個網域作業所在的模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode"></xref> values that indicates the mode that this domain is operating in.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode"></xref>值，表示這個網域作業所在的模式。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the mode level that this domain is operating in.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個網域作業所在的模式層級。

trans-unit.source: The domain mode level.
trans-unit.target: 網域模式層級。

trans-unit.source: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain.
trans-unit.target: 尋找這個網域中的所有可探索網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由查詢 DNS SRV 記錄來尋找可探索的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: Only those domain controllers that register the generic, non-site-specific, domain controller SRV record will be returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回只註冊泛型、 非特定站台、 網域控制站的 SRV 記錄這些網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection"></xref> that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含這個方法所找到的網域控制站物件。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain that are also in the specified site.
trans-unit.target: 尋找中指定的站台也會有這個網域中的所有可探索的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由查詢 DNS SRV 記錄來尋找可探索的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: If a domain controller does not register an SRV record for the specified site, it will not be returned by this method, even if the domain controller is physically located within that site.
trans-unit.target: 如果網域控制站不會註冊指定的站台的 SRV 記錄，它將不會傳回使用這個方法，即使網域控制站實際上是位於站台中。

trans-unit.source: All domain controllers that register an SRV record for the specified site will be returned by this method, even if they are not physically located within that site.
trans-unit.target: 會使用這個方法，傳回註冊指定的站台的 SRV 記錄的所有網域控制站，即使不是實際位在該站台內。

trans-unit.source: The name of the site to search for the domain controllers.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋網域控制站的站台名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection"></xref> that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含這個方法所找到的網域控制站物件。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: siteName is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: siteName為空字串。

trans-unit.source: siteName is .
trans-unit.target: siteNameis .

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Finds all of the domain controllers in this domain.
trans-unit.target: 尋找這個網域中的所有網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection"></xref> that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含這個方法所找到的網域控制站物件。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Finds all of the domain controllers in this domain that are also in the specified site.
trans-unit.target: 尋找中指定的站台也會有這個網域中的所有網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: The name of the site to search for the domain controllers.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋網域控制站的站台名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection"></xref> that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含這個方法所找到的網域控制站物件。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: siteName is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: siteName為空字串。

trans-unit.source: siteName is .
trans-unit.target: siteNameis .

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Finds any domain controller in this domain.
trans-unit.target: 尋找這個網域中的任何網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: This method finds any domain controller in the domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會尋找任何網域控制站的網域中。

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee that the same domain controller will be found by another call to this method.
trans-unit.target: 沒有相同的網域控制站會找到另一個呼叫這個方法保證。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"></xref> that represents the domain controller that is found by this method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"> </xref> ，代表這個方法所找到的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: A domain controller cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: 找不到網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Finds a domain controller in this domain that meets the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 尋找符合指定的準則的這個網域中的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: A combination of one or more of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions"></xref> members that defines the type of domain controller to find.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個組合<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions"></xref>定義要尋找網域控制站類型的成員。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"></xref> that represents the domain controller that is found by this method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"> </xref> ，代表這個方法所找到的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: A domain controller cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: 找不到網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The flag parameter contains an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: flag 參數包含無效的值。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Finds a domain controller in this domain and in the specified site.
trans-unit.target: 在此網域和指定的站台中尋找網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: The name of the site to search for the domain controller.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋網域控制站的站台名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"></xref> object that represents the domain controller that is found by this method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"> </xref>物件，代表這個方法所找到的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: A domain controller cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: 找不到網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: siteName is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: siteName為空字串。

trans-unit.source: siteName is .
trans-unit.target: siteNameis .

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Finds a domain controller in this domain and in the specified site that meets the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 在這個網域和指定的站台，符合指定的準則，請尋找網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: The name of the site to search for the domain controller.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋網域控制站的站台名稱。

trans-unit.source: A combination of one or more of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions"></xref> members that defines the type of domain controller to find.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個組合<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions"></xref>定義要尋找網域控制站類型的成員。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"></xref> object that represents the domain controller that is found by this method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"> </xref>物件，代表這個方法所找到的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: A domain controller cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: 找不到網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This exception will occur for any of the following reasons.
trans-unit.target: 基於下列原因，會發生此例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: - siteName is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: - siteName 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: - flag contains an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: - flag 包含無效的值。

trans-unit.source: siteName is .
trans-unit.target: siteNameis .

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the forest that this domain is a member of.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個網域所隸屬的樹系。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"></xref> object that represents the forest that this domain is a member of.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"> </xref>物件，表示這個網域所隸屬的樹系。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all of the trust relationships for this domain.
trans-unit.target: 擷取所有此網域的信任關係。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustRelationshipInformationCollection"></xref> object that contains all of the trust relationships for this domain.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustRelationshipInformationCollection"> </xref>物件，包含所有此網域的信任關係。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object that represents the domain to which the local computer is joined.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref>物件，代表本機電腦已加入網域。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the GetComputerDomain method is a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain> object representing the domain to which the computer running the application is joined.
trans-unit.target: GetComputerDomain 方法的傳回值是<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain>物件，表示執行應用程式的電腦已加入的網域。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain>

trans-unit.source: This return value is independent of the domain credentials under which the application is run.
trans-unit.target: 這個傳回值無關的應用程式執行所在的網域認證。

trans-unit.source: This method will retrieve the computer's domain regardless of the trusted account domain credentials it is run under.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會擷取電腦的網域，不論下執行的受信任的帳戶網域認證。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain> object that represents the domain corresponding to the user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running, use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.GetCurrentDomain%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain>物件，表示對應的網域使用者認證作用中的應用程式執行所在的安全性內容，請使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.GetCurrentDomain%2A>方法而。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.GetCurrentDomain%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object that represents the domain to which the local machine is joined.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref>物件，代表本機電腦已加入網域。

trans-unit.source: A connection to the domain could not be made.
trans-unit.target: 無法連接到網域。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object for the current user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref>物件目前的使用者認證，作用中的應用程式執行所在的安全性內容。

trans-unit.source: GetCurrentDomain method is determined by the domain credentials under which the application is running.
trans-unit.target: GetCurrentDomain 方法取決於應用程式執行所在的網域認證。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain> object representing the domain to which the computer running the application is joined, regardless of the credentials associated with that application, use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.GetComputerDomain%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain>加入物件，代表要執行應用程式的電腦的網域，無論與該應用程式相關聯的認證，請使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.GetComputerDomain%2A>方法而。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.GetComputerDomain%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain>

trans-unit.source: See Also <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.GetComputerDomain%2A>
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.GetComputerDomain%2A></xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.GetComputerDomain%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object that represents the domain for the specified user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref>物件，代表指定之使用者的網域認證作用中的應用程式執行所在的安全性內容。

trans-unit.source: A connection to the current context could not be made.
trans-unit.target: 無法連接到目前的內容。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that represents the default naming context of the domain.
trans-unit.target: 擷取<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>物件，表示網域的預設命名內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that represents the domain.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>表示網域物件。

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 目前的物件已被處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object for the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref>指定之內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that contains the target and credentials to use to retrieve the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref>物件，其中包含的目標和認證来用來擷取物件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the context must be a domain or directory server.
trans-unit.target: 內容的類型必須是網域或目錄的伺服器。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object that represents the domain for the specified context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref>物件，代表指定之內容的網域。

trans-unit.source: A connection to the target specified in context could not be made.
trans-unit.target: 連接中指定的目標 context 無法建立。

trans-unit.source: context is not valid.
trans-unit.target: context不正確。

trans-unit.source: context is .
trans-unit.target: contextis .

trans-unit.source: Determines the authentication type of an inbound trust.
trans-unit.target: 判斷連入信任的驗證類型。

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the domain which with the trust exists.
trans-unit.target: 信任存在的網域 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the authentication of the trust is selective; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the authentication is domain-wide.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果信任的驗證是選擇性的;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果驗證整個網域。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the that is specified by the targetForestName parameter.
trans-unit.target: 沒有信任關係所指定 targetForestName 參數。

trans-unit.source: The call to LsaQueryTrustedDomainInfoByName failed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 LsaQueryTrustedDomainInfoByName 失敗。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic [LsaQueryTrustedDomainInfoByName](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/en-us/secmgmt/security/lsaquerytrusteddomaininfobyname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱主題[LsaQueryTrustedDomainInfoByName](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/en-us/secmgmt/security/lsaquerytrusteddomaininfobyname.asp)在 MSDN Library 中[http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.target: targetDomainName為空字串。

trans-unit.target: targetDomainNameis .

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 目前的物件已被處置。

trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.target: 決定的 SID 篩選狀態的信任。

trans-unit.target: 信任關聯性存在的網域 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if SID filtering is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用 SID 篩選。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 沒有信任關係所指定 targetForestName 參數。

trans-unit.target: 取得這個網域和指定的網域之間的信任關係。

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the domain with which the trust relationship exists.
trans-unit.target: 與其存在信任關係之網域的 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustRelationshipInformation"></xref> object that represents the trust relationship between this domain and the specified domain.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustRelationshipInformation"> </xref>物件，表示這個網域和指定的網域之間的信任關係。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the that is specified by the targetForestName parameter.
trans-unit.target: 沒有信任關係所指定 targetForestName 參數。

trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets the infrastructure role owner for this domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個網域的基礎結構角色擁有者。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"></xref> object that represents the domain controller that holds the infrastructure owner role.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"> </xref>物件，代表持有基礎結構擁有者角色的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent domain of this domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個網域的父系網域。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object that represents the parent domain of this domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref>物件，代表此網域的父系網域。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this domain has no parent domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果這個網域沒有父系網域。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"></xref> object that holds the primary domain controller (PDC) for this domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"></xref>持有這個網域的網域主控站 (PDC) 的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"></xref> object that represents the domain controller that holds the PDC emulator role for this domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"> </xref>物件，代表持有這個網域 PDC 模擬器角色的網域控制站。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Raises the mode of operation for the domain.
trans-unit.target: 提高網域的作業模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode> value can be raised but not lowered.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>值可以引發，但不是會降低。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>

trans-unit.source: This means that raising the functionality level of the domain is not reversible and the decision to do this should be made carefully.
trans-unit.target: 這表示提高網域功能等級是無法回復，而且若要這樣做的決策應該小心進行。

trans-unit.source: For more information about domain operational modes, see [Domain and forest functionality](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp).
trans-unit.target: 如需網域操作模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[網域與樹系功能](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp)。

trans-unit.source: The following table defines the valid values for `domainMode` based on the current operating mode of the domain.
trans-unit.target: 下表定義的有效值`domainMode`根據目前的作業模式的網域。

trans-unit.source: |Current mode|Mode can be raised to| |------------------|---------------------------| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>|<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>
trans-unit.target: |目前模式 |模式可引發來 | |------------------|---------------------------| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>|<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode></xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode></xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode></xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>|<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>|<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>|None|
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>|<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>|<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>|None|</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode></xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode></xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode></xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode></xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode></xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode"> </xref>列舉值，指定網域的新作業層級。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: Based on the current operating mode of the domain, the value specified for domainMode is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 根據目前的作業模式的網域，為指定的值 domainMode 不正確。

trans-unit.source: domainMode is not a valid enumeration value.

trans-unit.source: Raises the functionality level for the domain.
trans-unit.target: 提高網域功能層級。

trans-unit.source: A value representing the new level.
trans-unit.target: 值，表示新的層級。

trans-unit.source: Repairs a trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 修復信任關係。

trans-unit.source: This method repairs the trust by resetting the secure channel for the trust.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會藉由重設的安全通道信任修復信任。

trans-unit.source: If the operation fails to reset the secure channel, then it will also reset the trust password.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業無法重設的安全性通道，然後它也會重設信任密碼。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object that represents the domain with which the trust exists.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref>表示與其存在信任之網域的物件。

trans-unit.source: Updates the password for the local side of a trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 更新信任關係本機端的密碼。

trans-unit.source: To re-establish the trust, both sides of the trust must be updated with the same password.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新建立信任關係，雙方的信任必須更新以相同的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the domain with which a trust exists.

trans-unit.source: Updates the trust direction for an existing trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 更新現有的信任關係的信任方向。

trans-unit.source: The trust directions are updated on both sides of the trust.
trans-unit.target: 更新信任方向上雙方的信任。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object that represents the domain with which the trust exists.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref>表示與其存在信任之網域的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection"></xref> value that specifies the new trust direction for the trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection"> </xref>值，指定信任關係之新信任方向。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the domain that is specified by the targetDomain parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的網域沒有信任關係 targetDomain 參數。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: targetDomain is .
trans-unit.target: targetDomainis .

trans-unit.source: newTrustDirection is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: newTrustDirection不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a previously established outbound trust with the specified domain is valid.
trans-unit.target: 請確認指定的網域與先前建立的傳出信任有效。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to verify that a trust relationship has been fully established.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來確認已完整建立信任關係。

trans-unit.source: The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.
trans-unit.target: 在建立雙方的信任之前，不會建立信任。

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the domain with which the trust exists.
trans-unit.target: 與其存在信任之網域的 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: There is no outbound trust relationship with the domain that is specified by targetDomainName.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的網域沒有輸出信任關係 targetDomainName 。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: targetDomainName is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: targetDomainName為空字串。

trans-unit.source: targetDomainName is .
trans-unit.target: targetDomainNameis .

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a previously established trust with the specified domain is valid.
trans-unit.target: 請確認與指定之網域的先前建立的信任有效。

trans-unit.source: This method verifies that a trust relationship has been fully established.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會驗證已完整建立信任關係。

trans-unit.source: The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.
trans-unit.target: 在建立雙方的信任之前，不會建立信任。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object that represents the domain with which the trust exists.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref>表示與其存在信任之網域的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection"></xref> value that specifies the direction, relative to this domain, of the trust.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection"> </xref>值，指定，相對於這個網域，信任方向。

trans-unit.source: There is no trust relationship with the domain that is specified by the targetDomain parameter, or the target domain does not have the trust direction that is specified by the direction parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的網域沒有信任關係 targetDomain 參數或目標網域沒有所指定的信任方向 direction 參數。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: targetDomain is .
trans-unit.target: targetDomainis .

trans-unit.source: direction is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: direction不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。
